./error_rate_references-master/BCH/AWGN/BPSK/ALGEBRAIC/BCH_N1023_K523_algebraic_T55.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
ci=on
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "BCH" -N "1023" -K "523" -T "55" -m "0" -M "10" -s "0.2" -e "1000" --src-implem "FAST" --mdm-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST"
title=BCH (1023,523,55)

[trace]

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "LDPC" -R "5:0.2:10" -K "16384" --enc-type "LDPC_IRA" --dec-h-path "conf/dec/LDPC/PureIRA_R_4_5_N20k_H.alist" --dec-type "BP_FLOODING" --dec-implem "GALB" -i "50"

[trace]

./error_rate_references-master/LDPC/AWGN/BPSK/BP_FLOODING/SPA/LDPC_N576_K288_flooding_SPA_i100_WiMAX_intra.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" --sim-cde-type "LDPC" -m "0.0" -M "3.51" -s "0.25" --mnt-max-fe "100" --src-type "AZCW" -K "288" -N "576" --enc-type "AZCW" --pct-type "NO" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --dec-type "BP_FLOODING" --dec-implem "SPA" --dec-h-path "conf/dec/LDPC/WIMAX_288_576.alist" --dec-ite "100" --dec-synd-depth "1" --dec-simd "INTRA"
title=LDPC (576,288) SPA 100 ite. WiMAX intra

[trace]
# ----------------------------------------------------
# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = BFER
#    ** Type of bits              = int32
#    ** Type of reals             = float32
#    ** Date (UTC)                = 2018-12-04 09:59:39
#    ** Git version               = v2.0.0-163-g52ef48bf7
#    ** Code type (C)             = LDPC
#    ** Noise range               = 0 -> 3.5 dB
#    ** Noise type (E)            = EBN0
#    ** Seed                      = 0
#    ** Statistics                = off
#    ** Debug mode                = off
#    ** Multi-threading (t)       = 72 thread(s)
#    ** Coset approach (c)        = no
#    ** Coded monitoring          = no
#    ** Bad frames tracking       = off
#    ** Bad frames replay         = off
#    ** Bit rate                  = 0.5 (1/2)
#    ** Inter frame level         = 1
# * Source ----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = AZCW
#    ** Implementation            = STD
#    ** Info. bits (K_info)       = 288
# * Codec -----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = LDPC

[metadata]

./error_rate_references-master/LDPC/AWGN/BPSK/BP_HORIZONTAL_LAYERED/NMS/LDPC_N576_K288_hlayered_NMS_i100_WiMAX.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type BFER -C LDPC --src-type AZCW -K 288 -N 576 -m 0.00 -M 3.51 -s 0.25 -e 100 --dec-type BP_HORIZONTAL_LAYERED --dec-implem NMS -i 100 --dec-h-path conf/dec/LDPC/WIMAX_288_576.alist --dec-norm 0.825 --dec-no-synd
title=LDPC (576,288) NMS 100 ite. WiMAX

[trace]
# ----------------------------------------------------
# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = BFER
#    ** Type of bits              = int32
#    ** Type of reals             = float32
#    ** Date (UTC)                = 2018-05-17 14:17:49
#    ** Git version               = v1.3.2-470-gf8de061
#    ** Code type (C)             = LDPC
#    ** Noise range               = 0 -> 3.5 dB
#    ** Noise type (E)            = EBN0
#    ** Seed                      = 0
#    ** Statistics                = off
#    ** Debug mode                = off
#    ** Multi-threading (t)       = 4 thread(s)
#    ** Coset approach (c)        = no
#    ** Coded monitoring          = no
#    ** Bad frames tracking       = off
#    ** Bad frames replay         = off
#    ** Bit rate                  = 0.5 (1/2)
#    ** Inter frame level         = 1
# * Source ----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = AZCW
#    ** Implementation            = STD
#    ** Info. bits (K_info)       = 288
# * Codec -----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = LDPC
#    ** Info. bits (K)            = 288
#    ** Codeword size (N_cw)      = 576
#    ** Frame size (N)            = 576
#    ** Code rate                 = 0.5 (1/2)
# * Encoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = AZCW
#    ** Systematic                = yes
# * Decoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type (D)                  = BP_HORIZONTAL_LAYERED
#    ** Implementation            = NMS
#    ** Systematic                = yes
#    ** H matrix path             = conf/dec/LDPC/WIMAX_288_576.alist
#    ** H matrix reordering       = NONE
#    ** Num. of iterations (i)    = 100
#    ** Normalize factor          = 0.825000
#    ** Stop criterion (syndrome) = off
# * Modem -----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = BPSK
#    ** Implementation            = STD
#    ** Bits per symbol           = 1
#    ** Sampling factor           = 1
#    ** Sigma square              = on
# * Channel ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = AWGN
#    ** Implementation            = STD
#    ** Complex                   = off
#    ** Add users                 = off
# * Monitor ---------------------------------------
#    ** Frame error count (e)     = 100
#    ** Compute mutual info       = no
# * Terminal --------------------------------------
#    ** Enabled                   = yes
#    ** Frequency (ms)            = 500
#
# The simulation is running...
# ----------------------------------------------------------------------||--------------------------------||---------------------
#       Bit Error Rate (BER) and Frame Error Rate (FER) depending       ||     Decoder throughput and     ||  Global throughput
#                    on the Signal Noise Ratio (SNR)                    ||      latency (per thread)      ||  and elapsed time
# ----------------------------------------------------------------------||--------------------------------||---------------------
# -------|-------|----------|----------|----------|----------|----------||----------|----------|----------||----------|----------
#  Es/N0 | Eb/N0 |      FRA |       BE |       FE |      BER |      FER ||     CTHR |     ITHR |  LATENCY || SIM_CTHR |    ET/RT

#    ** Info. bits (K)            = 12600

./error_rate_references-master/LDPC/AWGN/BPSK/BP_VERTICAL_LAYERED

./error_rate_references-master/LDPC/AWGN/BPSK/BP_VERTICAL_LAYERED/SPA

./error_rate_references-master/LDPC/AWGN/BPSK/BP_VERTICAL_LAYERED/SPA/LDPC_N8000_K4000_vlayered_SPA_i2000_MacKay.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "LDPC" --enc-type "LDPC_H" -m "1.00" -M "1.70" -s "0.1" --dec-implem "SPA" --dec-h-path "conf/dec/LDPC/MACKAY_4000_8000.alist" -e "100" -i "2000" --dec-type "BP_VERTICAL_LAYERED"
doi=10.1109/ACSSC.2002.1197141
info=Figure 1
title=LDPC (8000,4000) SPA 2000 ite. MacKay

[trace]
# ----------------------------------------------------
# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = BFER
#    ** Type of bits              = int32
#    ** Type of reals             = float32
#    ** Date (UTC)                = 2018-07-06 13:00:26
#    ** Git version               = v1.3.2-718-ga0aee591
#    ** Code type (C)             = LDPC
#    ** Noise range               = 1 -> 1.7 dB
#    ** Noise type (E)            = EBN0
#    ** Seed                      = 0
#    ** Statistics                = off
#    ** Debug mode                = off
#    ** Multi-threading (t)       = 72 thread(s)
#    ** Coset approach (c)        = no
#    ** Coded monitoring          = no
#    ** Bad frames tracking       = off
#    ** Bad frames replay         = off
#    ** Bit rate                  = 0.5 (1/2)
#    ** Inter frame level         = 1
# * Source ----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = RAND
#    ** Implementation            = STD
#    ** Info. bits (K_info)       = 4000
# * Codec -----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = LDPC
#    ** Info. bits (K)            = 4000
#    ** Codeword size (N_cw)      = 8000
#    ** Frame size (N)            = 8000
#    ** Code rate                 = 0.5 (1/2)
# * Encoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = LDPC_H
#    ** Systematic                = yes
#    ** H matrix path             = conf/dec/LDPC/MACKAY_4000_8000.alist
#    ** H matrix reordering       = NONE
# * Decoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type (D)                  = BP_VERTICAL_LAYERED
#    ** Implementation            = SPA
#    ** Systematic                = yes
#    ** H matrix path             = conf/dec/LDPC/MACKAY_4000_8000.alist
#    ** H matrix reordering       = NONE

#    ** Stop criterion (syndrome) = on
#    ** Stop criterion depth      = 1

[metadata]

command=aff3ct -C LDPC --sim-type BFERI --sim-prec 32 -m 0.0 -M 2.51 -s 0.25 -K 2112 -N 4224 --sim-coset --src-type RAND --src-implem FAST --itl-type USER --itl-path conf/itl/GSM-LDPC_4224.itl --mdm-type CPM --chn-type AWGN --chn-implem FAST --sim-ite 10 --dec-type BP_HORIZONTAL_LAYERED --dec-h-path conf/dec/LDPC/GSM_2112_4224.alist --dec-implem SPA --dec-ite 1 --mnt-max-fe 100 --mdm-max MAXS --mdm-cpm-std GSM
title=LDPC (4224,2112) GSM-SPA 10 turbo ite.

[trace]

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -C LDPC --sim-type BFERI --sim-prec 32 -m 0.0 -M 2.51 -s 0.25 -K 2112 -N 4224 --sim-coset --src-type RAND --src-implem FAST --itl-type USER --itl-path conf/itl/GSM-LDPC_4224.itl --mdm-type CPM --chn-type AWGN --chn-implem FAST --sim-ite 20 --dec-type BP_HORIZONTAL_LAYERED --dec-h-path conf/dec/LDPC/GSM_2112_4224.alist --dec-implem SPA --dec-ite 1 --mnt-max-fe 100 --mdm-max MAXS --mdm-cpm-std GSM
title=LDPC (4224,2112) GSM-SPA 20 turbo ite.

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -C LDPC --sim-type BFERI --sim-prec 32 -m 0.0 -M 2.51 -s 0.25 -K 2112 -N 4224 --sim-coset --src-type RAND --src-implem FAST --itl-type USER --itl-path conf/itl/GSM-LDPC_4224.itl --mdm-type CPM --chn-type AWGN --chn-implem FAST --sim-ite 30 --dec-type BP_HORIZONTAL_LAYERED --dec-h-path conf/dec/LDPC/GSM_2112_4224.alist --dec-implem SPA --dec-ite 1 --mnt-max-fe 100 --mdm-max MAXS --mdm-cpm-std GSM
title=LDPC (4224,2112) GSM-SPA 30 turbo ite.

./error_rate_references-master/LDPC/BEC/OOK/BP_HORIZONTAL_LAYERED/NMS/LDPC_N16200_K10800_hlayered_NMS_i10_DVB-S2.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "LDPC" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --enc-type "LDPC_DVBS2" -K "10800" -N "16200" -e "200" --dec-type "BP_HORIZONTAL_LAYERED" --dec-implem "NMS" -i "10" --dec-norm "0.825" --dec-simd "INTER" --chn-type "BEC" --mdm-type "OOK" -R "0.1:0.05:0.5,0.01:0.002:0.3" -E "EP"
title=LDPC (16200,10800) NMS 10 ite. DVB-S2

[trace]
# ----------------------------------------------------
# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = BFER
#    ** Type of bits              = int32
#    ** Type of reals             = float32
#    ** Date (UTC)                = 2018-12-19 15:09:48
#    ** Git version               = v2.1.1-161-ga9d92d5
#    ** Code type (C)             = LDPC
#    ** Noise range               = 0.01 -> 0.5 dB
#    ** Noise type (E)            = EP
#    ** Seed                      = 0
#    ** Statistics                = off
#    ** Debug mode                = off
#    ** Multi-threading (t)       = 8 thread(s)
#    ** Coset approach (c)        = no
#    ** Coded monitoring          = no
#    ** Bad frames tracking       = off
#    ** Bad frames replay         = off
#    ** Bit rate                  = 0.666667 (2/3)
#    ** Inter frame level         = 8
# * Source ----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = RAND
#    ** Implementation            = FAST
#    ** Info. bits (K_info)       = 10800
# * Codec -----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = LDPC
#    ** Info. bits (K)            = 10800
#    ** Codeword size (N_cw)      = 16200
#    ** Frame size (N)            = 16200
#    ** Code rate                 = 0.666667 (2/3)
# * Encoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = LDPC_DVBS2
#    ** Systematic                = yes
# * Decoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type (D)                  = BP_HORIZONTAL_LAYERED
#    ** Implementation            = NMS
#    ** Systematic                = yes
#    ** SIMD strategy             = INTER
#    ** Num. of iterations (i)    = 10
#    ** Normalize factor          = 0.825000
#    ** Stop criterion (syndrome) = on
#    ** Stop criterion depth      = 1
# * Modem -----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                      = OOK
#    ** Implementation            = STD
#    ** Bits per symbol           = 1
#    ** Sigma square              = on
# * Channel ---------------------------------------

#    ** Add users                 = off

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "LDPC" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --enc-type "LDPC_DVBS2" -K "10800" -N "16200" -e "200" --dec-type "BP_HORIZONTAL_LAYERED" --dec-implem "NMS" -i "30" --dec-norm "0.825" --dec-simd "INTER" --chn-type "BEC" --mdm-type "OOK" -R "0.1:0.05:0.5,0.01:0.002:0.3" -E "EP"
title=LDPC (16200,10800) NMS 30 ite. DVB-S2

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "1" -M "5.01" -s "0.25" -e "500" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "120" -N "160" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --dec-type "ASCL" --pct-type "SHORTLAST" --dec-simd "INTRA"  -L "32" --crc-poly "24-LTEA" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R1,R0L,REP,SPC_4}"
info=Figure 5
title=Polar (160,120) ASCL FA L=32 CRC 24-bit SPC4 32-bit
doi=10.1109/WCNCW.2017.7919040
url=https://arxiv.org/abs/1701.06458

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/ASCL/Polar_N2048_K1024_ASCL_L001_CRC32_SPC4_p32.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "32" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "0.0" -M "3.6" -s "0.1" -e "200" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "1056" -N "2048" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --dec-type "ASCL" --dec-simd "INTRA" --crc-type "32-GZIP" --crc-implem "FAST" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R0L,R1,REP,REPL,SPC_4}" -L "1"
info=Figure 3
title=Polar (2048,1024) ASCL L=001 CRC 32-bit SPC4 32-bit
url=https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.08314
doi=10.1007/s11265-018-1430-3

[trace]
# ----------------------------------------------------
# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = BFER
#    ** Type of bits             = int32
#    ** Type of reals            = float32
#    ** Date (UTC)               = 2018-06-17 16:36:19
#    ** Git version              = v1.3.2-659-g662929e
#    ** Code type (C)            = POLAR
#    ** Noise range              = 0 -> 3.6 dB
#    ** Noise type (E)           = EBN0
#    ** Seed                     = 0
#    ** Statistics               = off
#    ** Debug mode               = off
#    ** Multi-threading (t)      = 72 thread(s)
#    ** Coset approach (c)       = no
#    ** Coded monitoring         = no
#    ** Bad frames tracking      = off
#    ** Bad frames replay        = off
#    ** Bit rate                 = 0.5 (1/2)
#    ** Inter frame level        = 1
# * Source ----------------------------------------

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/ASCL/Polar_N2048_K1024_ASCL_L002_CRC32_SPC4_p32.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "32" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "0.0" -M "3.3" -s "0.1" -e "200" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "1056" -N "2048" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --dec-type "ASCL_MEM" --dec-simd "INTRA" --crc-type "32-GZIP" --crc-implem "FAST" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R0L,R1,REP,REPL,SPC_4}" -L "2"
info=Figure 3
title=Polar (2048,1024) ASCL L=002 CRC 32-bit SPC4 32-bit
url=https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.08314
doi=10.1007/s11265-018-1430-3

[trace]

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/ASCL/Polar_N2048_K1723_ASCL_FA_L32_CRC16_SPC4_p32.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "32" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "0.0" -M "4.51" -s "0.25" -e "200" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "1739" -N "2048" --src-type "RAND" --chn-type "AWGN" --dec-type "ASCL" --crc-type "16-IBM" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R0L,R1,REP,REPL,SPC_4}" -L "32"
info=Figure 5
title=Polar (2048,1723) ASCL FA L=32 CRC 16-bit SPC4 32-bit
url=https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.08314
doi=10.1007/s11265-018-1430-3

[trace]

# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = BFER
#    ** Type of bits             = int32
#    ** Type of reals            = float32
#    ** Date (UTC)               = 2018-06-17 19:55:19
#    ** Git version              = v1.3.2-659-g662929e
#    ** Code type (C)            = POLAR
#    ** Noise range              = 0 -> 4.5 dB
#    ** Noise type (E)           = EBN0
#    ** Seed                     = 0
#    ** Statistics               = off
#    ** Debug mode               = off
#    ** Multi-threading (t)      = 72 thread(s)
#    ** Coset approach (c)       = no
#    ** Coded monitoring         = no

#    ** Bad frames replay        = off
#    ** Bit rate                 = 0.841309 (1723/2048)

#    ** Frame size (N)           = 2048

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "8" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "0.0" -M "4.51" -s "0.25" -e "200" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "1755" -N "2048" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --qnt-bits "6" --qnt-dec "1" --qnt-implem "FAST" --dec-type "ASCL" --dec-simd "INTRA" --crc-type "32-GZIP" --crc-implem "FAST" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R0L,R1,REP,REPL,SPC_4}" -L "32"

title=Polar (2048,1723) ASCL FA L=32 CRC 32-bit SPC4 8-bit

#    ** Seed                     = 0

#    ** Coset approach (c)       = no

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/ASCL/Polar_N2048_K1723_ASCL_FA_L32_CRC32_SPC4+_p32.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "1.0" -M "4.51" -s "0.25" -K "1755" -N "2048" --src-type "AZCW" --chn-type AWGN --chn-implem FAST --dec-type "ASCL" --dec-simd "INTRA" -L "32" --crc-implem "FAST" --crc-poly "32-GZIP" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R0L,R1,REP,REPL,SPC_4+}"
title=Polar (2048,1755) ASCL FA L=32 CRC 32-bit SPC4+ 32-bit

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/ASCL/Polar_N2048_K1723_ASCL_FA_L32_CRC32_SPC4_REP8_p08.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "8" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "0.0" -M "4.51" -s "0.25" -e "200" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "1755" -N "2048" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --qnt-bits "6" --qnt-dec "1" --qnt-implem "FAST" --dec-type "ASCL" --dec-simd "INTRA" --crc-type "32-GZIP" --crc-implem "FAST" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R0L,R1,REP_2-8,REPL,SPC_4}" -L "32"
info=Figure 5
title=Polar (2048,1723) ASCL FA L=32 CRC 32-bit SPC4 REP8 8-bit
url=https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.08314
doi=10.1007/s11265-018-1430-3

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "1.0" -M "4.51" -s "0.25" -K "1755" -N "2048" --src-type "AZCW" --chn-type AWGN --chn-implem FAST --dec-type "ASCL" --dec-simd "INTRA" -L "8" --crc-implem "FAST" --crc-poly "32-GZIP" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R0L,R1,REP,REPL,SPC_4+}"
title=Polar (2048,1755) ASCL FA L=8 CRC 32-bit SPC4+ 32-bit

command=aff3ct -p "32" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "0.0" -M "4.51" -s "0.25" -e "200" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "1755" -N "2048" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --dec-type "ASCL" --dec-simd "INTRA" --crc-type "32-GZIP" --crc-implem "FAST" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R0L,R1,REP,REPL,SPC_4}" -L "32" --dec-partial-adaptive
title=Polar (2048,1723) ASCL PA L=32 CRC 32-bit SPC4 32-bit

[trace]

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/ASCL/Polar_N320_K160_ASCL_FA_L32_CRC24_SPC4_p32.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "1" -M "3.75" -s "0.25" -e "500" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "160" -N "320" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --dec-type "ASCL" --pct-type "SHORTLAST" --dec-simd "INTRA" -L "32" --crc-poly "24-LTEA" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R1,R0L,REP,SPC_4}"
info=Figure 4
title=Polar (320,160) ASCL FA L=32 CRC 24-bit SPC4 32-bit
doi=10.1109/WCNCW.2017.7919040
url=https://arxiv.org/abs/1701.06458

[trace]

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/SC/Polar_N128_K96_SC_NO_SYS_p08.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "08" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "0" -M "6" -s "0.25" -e "500" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" --enc-no-sys -K "96" -N "128" --dec-type "SC" --dec-implem "NAIVE"

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/SC/Polar_N128_K96_SC_NO_SYS_p16.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "16" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "0" -M "6" -s "0.25" -e "500" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" --enc-no-sys -K "96" -N "128" --dec-type "SC" --dec-implem "NAIVE"
title=Polar (128,96) SC NO SYS 16-bit

[trace]
# ----------------------------------------------------
# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                  = BFER
#    ** Type of bits          = int16
#    ** Type of reals         = float32
#    ** Type of quant. reals  = int16

#    ** Git version           = v1.3.2-659-g8d71ad2c

[trace]

# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/SC/Polar_N4096_K2048_SC_FILE_intra_p32.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "32" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -K "2048" -N "4096" -m "0.0" -M "3.2" -e "500" --enc-fb-gen-method "FILE" --enc-fb-awgn-path "conf/cde/awgn_polar_codes/TV/12/N4096_awgn_s0.692.pc" --dec-type "SC" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --dec-implem "FAST" --dec-simd "INTRA"
doi=10.1109/EUSIPCO.2016.7760327
info=Figure 2
title=Polar (4096,2048) SC FILE intra 32-bit

[metadata]

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "16" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "1.0" -M "4.51" -s "0.25" -e "500" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "1723" -N "2048" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --dec-type "SCAN" --dec-implem "NAIVE" -i "4" --qnt-bits "6" --qnt-dec "1"
title=Polar (2048,1723) SCAN 4 ite. 16-bit

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/SCL/Polar_N2048_K1723_SCL_L32_CRC08_SPC4_p32.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "32" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "0.0" -M "4.51" -s "0.25" -e "100" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "1731" -N "2048" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --dec-type "SCL" --dec-simd "INTRA" --crc-type "8-DVB-S2" --crc-implem "FAST" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R0L,R1,REP,REPL,SPC_4}" -L "32"
info=Figure 5
title=Polar (2048,1723) SCL L=32 CRC  8-bit SPC4 32-bit
url=https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.08314
doi=10.1007/s11265-018-1430-3

[trace]

# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----

# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = BFER
#    ** Type of bits             = int32
#    ** Type of reals            = float32

#    ** Seed                     = 0

#    ** Debug mode               = off

#    ** Coset approach (c)       = no

./error_rate_references-master/POLAR/AWGN/BPSK/SCL/Polar_N2048_K1723_SCL_L32_CRC16_SPC4_p32.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -p "32" --sim-type "BFER" -C "POLAR" -m "0.0" -M "4.51" -s "0.25" -e "100" --enc-fb-gen-method "GA" -K "1739" -N "2048" --src-type "RAND" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-type "AWGN" --chn-implem "FAST" --dec-type "SCL" --dec-simd "INTRA" --crc-type "16-IBM" --crc-implem "FAST" --dec-polar-nodes "{R0,R0L,R1,REP,REPL,SPC_4}" -L "32"
info=Figure 5
title=Polar (2048,1723) SCL L=32 CRC 16-bit SPC4 32-bit
url=https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.08314
doi=10.1007/s11265-018-1430-3

[trace]
# ----------------------------------------------------
# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = BFER
#    ** Type of bits             = int32
#    ** Type of reals            = float32
#    ** Date (UTC)               = 2018-06-22 11:10:06

./error_rate_references-master/RA/AWGN/BPSK/RA_N4096_K1024_MS_i10.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -m "1.0" -M "2.5" -s "0.1" -C "RA" -K "1024" -N "4096" --itl-type "RANDOM" --itl-seed "0" -i "10" -e "500"
url=https://pdfs.semanticscholar.org/b5cc/c94d4f9ea6df991190f17359ddd7ac47f005.pdf
info=Figure 5, yellow/orange curve (q=4,N=1024,it=10) /!\ can't be reproduced!
title=Min-Sum (4096,1024) 10 ite.

[trace]
# ----------------------------------------------------
# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters:
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                   = BFER
#    ** Type of bits           = int32
#    ** Type of reals          = float32
#    ** Date (UTC)             = 2019-02-12 12:40:21
#    ** Git version            = v2.2.2-74-g7d806f2
#    ** Code type (C)          = RA
#    ** Noise range            = 1 -> 2.5 dB
#    ** Noise type (E)         = EBN0
#    ** Seed                   = 0
#    ** Statistics             = off
#    ** Debug mode             = off
#    ** Multi-threading (t)    = 72 thread(s)
#    ** Coset approach (c)     = no
#    ** Coded monitoring       = no
#    ** Bad frames tracking    = off
#    ** Bad frames replay      = off
#    ** Bit rate               = 0.25 (1/4)
#    ** Inter frame level      = 1
# * Source ----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                   = RAND
#    ** Implementation         = STD
#    ** Info. bits (K_info)    = 1024
# * Codec -----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                   = RA
#    ** Info. bits (K)         = 1024
#    ** Codeword size (N_cw)   = 4096
#    ** Frame size (N)         = 4096

#    ** Num. of iterations (i) = 10
# * Interleaver -----------------------------------

[metadata]

command=aff3ct -p "8" -m "1.0" -M "10.0" -s "0.5" -C "REP" -K "128" -N "4096" --src-implem "FAST" --chn-implem "FAST" --qnt-type "POW2" --qnt-implem "FAST" --qnt-bits "4" --qnt-dec "1" --dec-implem "FAST" -e "500"

# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----

# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                   = BFER
#    ** Type of bits           = int32

./error_rate_references-master/TURBO/AWGN/BPSK/RSC_RSC/BCJR/CCSDS/Turbo_N5352_K1784_BCJR_i10_CCSDS.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct -C TURBO -K 1784 -m 0.0 -M 0.91 --enc-sub-std CCSDS -i 10 --dec-sub-max MAXS
title=Turbo (5368,1784) BCJR 10 ite. CCSDS

[trace]
# ----------------------------------------------------
# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                   = BFER
#    ** Type of bits           = int32
#    ** Type of reals          = float32
#    ** Date (UTC)             = 2018-05-17 14:30:02
#    ** Git version            = v1.3.2-470-gf8de061
#    ** Code type (C)          = TURBO
#    ** Noise range            = 0 -> 0.9 dB
#    ** Noise type (E)         = EBN0
#    ** Seed                   = 0
#    ** Statistics             = off

./error_rate_references-master/TURBO/AWGN/BPSK/RSC_RSC/BCJR/LTE/Turbo_N4096_K2048_BCJR_i8_fnc_LTE.txt:

Start_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "TURBO" -K "2048" -m "0.0" -M "2.0" -s "0.1" --enc-sub-std "LTE" -i "8" --dec-sf-type "LTE_VEC" --dec-sub-implem FAST --dec-sub-max "MAX" --pct-pattern "11,10,01" --crc-implem "FAST" --crc-poly "24-LTEA" --dec-fnc --dec-fnc-ite-m "5"
title=Turbo (4108,2048) BCJR 8 ite. FNC LTE

[trace]
# ----------------------------------------------------
# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = BFER
#    ** Type of bits             = int32
#    ** Type of reals            = float32
#    ** Date (UTC)               = 2018-05-17 14:30:43
#    ** Git version              = v1.3.2-470-gf8de061
#    ** Code type (C)            = TURBO
#    ** Noise range              = 0 -> 2 dB
#    ** Noise type (E)           = EBN0
#    ** Seed                     = 0
#    ** Statistics               = off
#    ** Debug mode               = off
#    ** Multi-threading (t)      = 4 thread(s)
#    ** Coset approach (c)       = no
#    ** Coded monitoring         = no
#    ** Bad frames tracking      = off
#    ** Bad frames replay        = off
#    ** Bit rate                 = 0.492697 (506/1027)
#    ** Inter frame level        = 1
# * Source ----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = RAND
#    ** Implementation           = STD
#    ** Info. bits (K_info)      = 2024
# * CRC -------------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = 24-LTEA
#    ** Polynomial (hexadecimal) = 0x864cfb
#    ** Size (in bit)            = 24
#    ** Implementation           = FAST
# * Codec -----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = TURBO
#    ** Info. bits (K)           = 2048
#    ** Codeword size (N_cw)     = 6156
#    ** Frame size (N)           = 4108
#    ** Code rate                = 0.498539 (512/1027)
# * Encoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = TURBO
#    ** Systematic               = yes
#    ** Tail length              = 12
#    Encoder --------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = RSC
#    ** Systematic               = yes
#    ** Tail length              = 6
#    ** Buffered                 = on
#    ** Standard                 = LTE
#    ** Polynomials              = {013,015}
# * Interleaver -----------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = LTE
#    ** Size                     = 2048

# * Decoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type (D)                 = TURBO

#    ** Enable json              = off

#    Scaling factor -------------------------------

#    ** Type                     = DVB-RCS1
# * Decoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type (D)                 = TURBO_DB
#    ** Implementation           = STD

#    ** Enabled                  = yes

#    ** FNC ite max              = 8
#    ** FNC ite step             = 1

# * CRC -------------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = 32-GZIP
#    ** Polynomial (hexadecimal) = 0x4c11db7
#    ** Size (in bit)            = 32
#    ** Implementation           = FAST
# * Codec -----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = TURBO_DB
#    ** Info. bits (K)           = 1504
#    ** Codeword size (N_cw)     = 4512
#    ** Frame size (N)           = 3008
#    ** Code rate                = 0.5 (1/2)
# * Encoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = TURBO_DB
#    ** Systematic               = yes
#    Encoder --------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = RSC_DB
#    ** Systematic               = yes
#    ** Buffered                 = on
#    ** Standard                 = DVB-RCS1
# * Interleaver -----------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = DVB-RCS1
# * Decoder ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type (D)                 = TURBO_DB
#    ** Implementation           = STD
#    ** Systematic               = yes
#    ** Num. of iterations (i)   = 8
#    Scaling factor -------------------------------
#    ** Enabled                  = yes
#    ** Scaling factor (SF)      = ADAPTIVE
#    ** SF iterations            = 8
#    Flip and check -------------------------------
#    ** Enabled                  = no
#    Decoder --------------------------------------
#    ** Type (D)                 = BCJR
#    ** Implementation           = DVB-RCS1
#    ** Systematic               = yes
#    ** Max type                 = MAX
# * Puncturer -------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = TURBO_DB
# * Modem -----------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = OOK
#    ** Implementation           = STD
#    ** Bits per symbol          = 1
#    ** Sampling factor          = 1
#    ** Sigma square             = on
# * Channel ---------------------------------------
#    ** Type                     = BSC
#    ** Implementation           = STD
#    ** Complex                  = off
#    ** Add users                = off
# * Monitor ---------------------------------------
#    ** Frame error count (e)    = 100
#    ** Compute mutual info      = no
# * Terminal --------------------------------------
#    ** Enabled                  = yes
#    ** Frequency (ms)           = 500
#
# The simulation is running...
# -----------------------------------------------------------------||---------------------
#          Bit Error Rate (BER) and Frame Error Rate (FER)         ||  Global throughput
#             depending on the Erasure Probability (EP)            ||  and elapsed time
# -----------------------------------------------------------------||---------------------
# ----------|----------|----------|----------|----------|----------||----------|----------
#        EP |      FRA |       BE |       FE |      BER |      FER ||  SIM_THR |    ET/RT
#           |          |          |          |          |          ||   (Mb/s) | (hhmmss)
# ----------|----------|----------|----------|----------|----------||----------|----------
     0.2000 |      107 |    40597 |      107 | 2.58e-01 | 1.00e+00 ||     1.51 | 00h00'00
     0.1800 |      107 |    38566 |      107 | 2.45e-01 | 1.00e+00 ||     8.74 | 00h00'00
     0.1600 |      107 |    35073 |      107 | 2.23e-01 | 1.00e+00 ||     9.32 | 00h00'00
     0.1400 |      107 |    30980 |      107 | 1.97e-01 | 1.00e+00 ||     9.36 | 00h00'00
     0.1200 |      107 |    25623 |      107 | 1.63e-01 | 1.00e+00 ||     9.12 | 00h00'00
     0.1000 |      111 |    11807 |      107 | 7.23e-02 | 9.64e-01 ||     9.47 | 00h00'00
     0.0800 |     2962 |     2836 |      101 | 6.50e-04 | 3.41e-02 ||    16.28 | 00h00'00
     0.0600 |   728504 |      888 |      100 | 8.28e-07 | 1.37e-04 ||    25.44 | 00h00'42
# End of the simulation.
End_File

[metadata]
command=aff3ct --sim-type "BFER" -C "UNCODED" -K "128" -R 0:1:15 --chn-type AWGN --chn-implem FAST --mdm-type "SCMA" --mdm-ite "6" -e "500" -F "6"  --mdm-codebook conf/mod/SCMA/CS1.cb
title=Uncoded K=128 8-SCMA CS1
url = https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8011314

# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                  = BFER

#    ** Type of reals         = float32

[trace]

# ---- A FAST FORWARD ERROR CORRECTION TOOLBOX >> ----
# ----------------------------------------------------
# Parameters :
# * Simulation ------------------------------------
#    ** Type                  = BFER
#    ** Type of bits          = int32
